main event: A civilian observed a pin point of reddish light in the sky in St. Louis, Missouri in August 1958.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during heavy clouds and rain,The light suddenly disappeared possibly related to Lambert Airport light,The object was seen for about 20-25 minutes,No photographs were included in the report,The report concludes that the object could be a balloon or astronomical in nature.
sighted object: a pin point of reddish light
witness description: a civilian machinist living at 18 Avenue, St. Louis, Missouri
